sn22.81:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
sn22.81:1.2: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya kosambim pindaya pavisi.
sn22.81:1.3: Kosambiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto samam senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya anamantetva upatthake anapaloketva bhikkhusangham eko adutiyo carikam pakkami.
sn22.81:2.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu acirapakkantassa bhagavato yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
sn22.81:2.2: “esavuso ananda, bhagava samam senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya anamantetva upatthake anapaloketva bhikkhusangham eko adutiyo carikam pakkanto”ti.
sn22.81:2.3: “Yasmim, avuso, samaye bhagava samam senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya anamantetva upatthake anapaloketva bhikkhusangham eko adutiyo carikam pakkamati, ekova bhagava tasmim samaye viharitukamo hoti;
sn22.81:2.4: na bhagava tasmim samaye kenaci anubandhitabbo hoti”ti.
sn22.81:3.1: Atha kho bhagava anupubbena carikam caramano yena palileyyakam tadavasari.
sn22.81:3.2: Tatra sudam bhagava palileyyake viharati bhaddasalamule.
sn22.81:3.3: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yenayasma anando tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmata anandena saddhim sammodimsu.
sn22.81:3.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu ayasmantam anandam etadavocum:
sn22.81:3.5: “cirassuta kho no, avuso ananda, bhagavato sammukha dhammi katha;
sn22.81:3.6: icchama mayam, avuso ananda, bhagavato sammukha dhammim katham sotun”ti.
sn22.81:4.1: Atha kho ayasma anando tehi bhikkhuhi saddhim yena palileyyakam bhaddasalamulam yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
sn22.81:4.2: Ekamantam nisinne kho te bhikkhu bhagava dhammiya kathaya sandassesi samadapesi samuttejesi sampahamsesi.
sn22.81:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena annatarassa bhikkhuno evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
sn22.81:4.4: “katham nu kho janato katham passato anantara asavanam khayo hoti”ti?
sn22.81:4.5: Atha kho bhagava tassa bhikkhuno cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya bhikkhu amantesi:
sn22.81:4.14: Evam vicayaso desito, bhikkhave, maya dhammo.
sn22.81:4.15: Evam vicayaso desite kho, bhikkhave, maya dhamme atha ca panidhekaccassa bhikkhuno evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
sn22.81:4.16: ‘katham nu kho janato katham passato anantara asavanam khayo hoti’ti?
sn22.81:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, janato katham passato anantara asavanam khayo hoti?
sn22.81:5.2: Idha bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano ariyanam adassavi ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinito, sappurisanam adassavi sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito
sn22.81:5.4: Ya kho pana sa, bhikkhave, samanupassana sankharo so.
sn22.81:5.5: So pana sankharo kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo?
sn22.81:5.6: Avijjasamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phutthassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppanna tanha;
sn22.81:5.8: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi sankharo anicco sankhato paticcasamuppanno.
sn22.81:5.10: Sapi vedana, sopi phasso anicco sankhato paticcasamuppanno.
sn22.81:5.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, janato evam passato anantara asavanam khayo hoti.
sn22.81:6.1: Na heva kho rupam attato samanupassati;
sn22.81:6.2: api ca kho rupavantam attanam samanupassati.
sn22.81:6.3: Ya kho pana sa, bhikkhave, samanupassana sankharo so.
sn22.81:6.4: So pana sankharo kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo?
sn22.81:6.5: Avijjasamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phutthassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppanna tanha;
sn22.81:6.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi sankharo anicco sankhato paticcasamuppanno.
sn22.81:6.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, janato evam passato anantara asavanam khayo hoti.
sn22.81:7.1: Na heva kho rupam attato samanupassati, na rupavantam attanam samanupassati;
sn22.81:7.2: api ca kho attani rupam samanupassati.
sn22.81:7.3: Ya kho pana sa, bhikkhave, samanupassana sankharo so.
sn22.81:7.4: So pana sankharo kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo?
sn22.81:7.5: Avijjasamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phutthassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppanna tanha;
sn22.81:7.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi sankharo anicco sankhato paticcasamuppanno.
sn22.81:7.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, janato evam passato anantara asavanam khayo hoti.
sn22.81:8.1: Na heva kho rupam attato samanupassati, na rupavantam attanam samanupassati, na attani rupam samanupassati;
sn22.81:8.2: api ca kho rupasmim attanam samanupassati.
sn22.81:8.3: Ya kho pana sa, bhikkhave, samanupassana sankharo so.
sn22.81:8.4: So pana sankharo kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo?
sn22.81:8.5: Avijjasamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phutthassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppanna tanha;
sn22.81:8.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi sankharo anicco sankhato paticcasamuppanno.
sn22.81:8.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, janato …pe… asavanam khayo hoti.
sn22.81:9.1: Na heva kho rupam attato samanupassati, na rupavantam attanam, na attani rupam, na rupasmim attanam samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.2: api ca kho vedanam attato samanupassati, api ca kho vedanavantam attanam samanupassati, api ca kho attani vedanam samanupassati, api ca kho vedanaya attanam samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.4: api ca kho sankhare attato samanupassati, api ca kho sankharavantam attanam samanupassati, api ca kho attani sankhare samanupassati, api ca kho sankharesu attanam samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.5: api ca kho vinnanam attato samanupassati, api ca kho vinnanavantam attanam, api ca kho attani vinnanam, api ca kho vinnanasmim attanam samanupassati.
sn22.81:9.6: Ya kho pana sa, bhikkhave, samanupassana sankharo so.
sn22.81:9.8: Avijjasamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phutthassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppanna tanha;
sn22.81:9.10: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi sankharo anicco sankhato paticcasamuppanno.
sn22.81:9.15: Evam kho, bhikkhave, janato evam passato anantara asavanam khayo hoti.
sn22.81:10.1: Na heva kho rupam attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:10.7: ‘so atta so loko, so pecca bhavissami nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo’ti.
sn22.81:10.8: Ya kho pana sa, bhikkhave, sassataditthi sankharo so.
sn22.81:10.10: evampi kho, bhikkhave, janato evam passato anantara asavanam khayo hoti.
sn22.81:11.1: Na heva kho rupam attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:11.7: ‘so atta so loko, so pecca bhavissami nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo’ti.
sn22.81:11.9: ‘no cassam no ca me siya nabhavissam na me bhavissati’ti.
sn22.81:11.10: Ya kho pana sa, bhikkhave, ucchedaditthi sankharo so.
sn22.81:11.11: So pana sankharo kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo?
sn22.81:11.12: Avijjasamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phutthassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppanna tanha;
sn22.81:11.14: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi sankharo anicco …pe…
sn22.81:11.15: evampi kho, bhikkhave, janato evam passato anantara asavanam khayo hoti.
sn22.81:12.1: Na heva kho rupam attato samanupassati, na vedanam …
sn22.81:12.5: na vinnanasmim attato samanupassati, napi evamditthi hoti:
sn22.81:12.6: ‘so atta so loko, so pecca bhavissami nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo’ti;
sn22.81:12.8: ‘no cassam no ca me siya nabhavissam na me bhavissati’ti;
sn22.81:12.9: api ca kho kankhi hoti vicikicchi anitthangato saddhamme.
sn22.81:12.10: Ya kho pana sa, bhikkhave, kankhita vicikicchita anitthangatata saddhamme sankharo so.
sn22.81:12.11: So pana sankharo kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo?
sn22.81:12.12: Avijjasamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phutthassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppanna tanha;
sn22.81:12.14: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi sankharo anicco sankhato paticcasamuppanno.
sn22.81:12.19: Evam kho, bhikkhave, janato evam passato anantara asavanam khayo hoti”ti.
